instruction: Given a description of a situation, provide an appropriate ethical judgement.
input: A chef was not happy with the performance of a waiter, so he yelled and cursed at him in front of other people.
output: The chef's behavior was unacceptable and unethical. It was wrong to berate the waiter and do so in front of the other people. The chef should apologize and find a better way to address the situation.
